{"step_by_step_thinking": "Crouzon syndrome is characterized by craniosynostosis, midface hypoplasia, and ocular hypertelorism as mentioned in Document [1], Document [2], and Document [3]. A beak-shaped nose is also a common feature of Crouzon syndrome as mentioned in Document [17] and Document [20].
